quotes.id: Fauzan cepat tanggap dan rapi dokumentasi. Eskalasi helpdesk jadi jauh lebih tertib.
quotes.en: Fauzan responds quickly and keeps documentation neat. Helpdesk escalations became far more organized.

quotes.id: Koordinasi shifting nasional mulus. Komunikatif dan bisa diandalkan saat event padat.
quotes.en: Nationwide shift coordination was smooth. Communicative and reliable during busy events.

quotes.id: Proaktif memberi solusi; dari jaringan sampai MDM semua tertangani.
quotes.en: Proactive in providing solutions; from networking to MDM, everything was handled.
